content: 2 half_double_crochet chain-1 space 2 half_double_crochet brackets repeat instructions within brackets as directed example double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip treble_crochet 2 times count totals total chain spaces are included in the st count corner chain spaces are not included in the total example counts 48 double_crochet 36 fptr 8 chain-2 space 4 chain-2 corner space 100 total/25 per side special instructions instructions for all rounds start with a standing stitch and end with an invisible join to 2nd st of round and fasten_off if not changing colors you can opt to finish the previous round with a slip_stitch join and use the appropriate chain or chainless starting stitch to begin the next round keep in mind that if you choose the slip stitch end the chain or chainless starting stitch will replace the first standing st of the round ✔️ navigate between written instructions stitch definitions videos and pictures by clicking on the corresponding links for example you can click here to see a picture of the square and then click on the picture to return to the link to view the yarns and colors used click here then click on the yarns and colors used link to return please be aware that some mobile phone users may experience difficulties round 1 colorway 1 - a stonewash / colorway 2 - a red into a double magic_ring chain 6 counts as 1st double_crochet of round and chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 times double_crochet cut yarn invisible join to 4th chain counts 8 double_crochet 4 chain-3 corner space 8 total round 2 colorway 1 - a stonewash / colorway 2 - a red starting in any chain-3 corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain-3 corner space double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 32 double_crochet 4 chain- 3 corner space 32 total/8 per side round 3 colorway 1 - b periwinkle / colorway 2 - b black starting in any chain-3 corner space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain-3 corner space bpdc around next 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 double_crochet bpdc around next 3 double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 24 double_crochet 24 bpdc 4 chain-2 space 4 chain-2 corner space 56 total/14 per side round 4 colorway 1 - c pale denim / colorway 2 - c ivory starting in any chain-2 corner space * 3dc-cluster chain 2 in chain-2 corner space dc3tog in worked chain-2 corner space and next 2 double_crochet chain 2 dc3tog in next double_crochet and next 2 bpdc chain 3 dc4tog in next bpdc 2 partial double_crochet in next chain-2 space and next bpdc chain 3 dc3tog in next 2 bpdc and next double_crochet chain 2 dc3tog in next 2 double_crochet and next chain-2 corner space chain 2 repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 4 3dc- cluster 16 dc3tog 4 dc4tog 16 chain-2 space 8 chain-3
